Project structure
File structure: Recommended file structure:
[Project Root] [src] [node_modules] [target] [test] index.html [tools] build.json package.json
[src] - holds any code that is developed in the project
[node_modules] - default location for npm installed modules
[target] - only folder allowed to change during the build process
[test] - test source files
[test]/index.html - enables test preview in a web browser
[tools] - additional tools/libraries/executables
build.json - project configuration file
package.json - package descriptor (to be used with NPM)
